img_text: I learned a lot of things about the real Thor and Norse myths while doing research for the presentation Apparently Odin was Mercury to the Romans Today at 21:29 obviously Dong Diddie Dop Mercury is Pb on the periodic table Today at 21:29 DongDiddleDop Today at 21:30 Pb is initials for Paul Bunyan Paul Bunyan has a blue ox you wanna know what lives with oxes? crows what do crows represent?
